languages.text: Вы пробуждаетесь от неспокойного сна на жесткой картонной подстилке, и странное чувство неправильности происходящего переполняет ваше естество. Вокруг мрак и вонь чужих тел. Кто-то бьет вас локтем под бок и, бранясь, хватает за шиворот. Это блюстительница, патрулирующая пустотный корабль. И она явно недовольна.

traits.locale_text: Вольный Торговец пробуждается от неспокойного сна на жесткой картонной подстилке, и странное чувство неправильности происходящего переполняет {mf|его|ее} естество. Вокруг мрак и вонь чужих тел. Кто-то бъет {mf|его|ее} локтем под бок и, бронясь, хватает за шиворот. Это стражница, патрулирующая пустотный корабль. И она явно недовольна.

languages.text: You awake after unsettled sleep to find yourself lying on a stiff cardboard mat. You are overcome with a strange sense of wrongness. The place is dark and reeks of body odour. Someone elbows you under the ribs and grabs you by the collar, spitting abuse. It is an enforcer patrolling the voidship. And she is clearly displeased.
languages.original_text: Вы пробуждаетесь от неспокойного сна на жесткой картонной подстилке, и странное чувство неправильности происходящего переполняет ваше естество. Вокруг мрак и вонь чужих тел. Кто-то бьет вас локтем под бок и, бранясь, хватает за шиворот. Это блюстительница, патрулирующая пустотный корабль. И она явно недовольна.

traits.locale_text: As the Rogue Trader awakes from uneasy dreams on a stiff cardboard mat, {mf|he|she} is overcome with an odd feeling of something wrong happening. {mf|He|She} is surrounded by darkness and body odour. Someone elbows {mf|him|her} under the ribs and grabs {mf|him|her} by the collar, mouthing abuse. It's a guard patrolling the voidship. And she's clearly displeased.

As the Rogue Trader awakes from uneasy dreams on a stiff cardboard mat, {mf|he|she} is overcome with an odd feeling of something wrong happening. {mf|He|She} is surrounded by darkness and body odour. Someone elbows {mf|him|her} under the ribs and grabs {mf|him|her} by the collar, mouthing abuse. It's a guard patrolling the voidship. And she's clearly displeased.

As the Rogue Trader awakes from uneasy dreams on a stiff cardboard mat, {mf|he|she} is overcome with an odd feeling of unease. {mf|He|She} is surrounded by darkness and body odour. Someone elbows {mf|him|her} under the ribs and grabs {mf|him|her} by the collar, mouthing abuse. It's a guard patrolling the voidship. And she's clearly displeased.

The Rogue Trader awakes after unsettled sleep to find {mf|himself|herself} lying on a stiff cardboard mat. {mf|He|She} is overcome with a strange sense of wrongness. The place is dark and reeks of body odour. Someone elbows the Rogue Trader under the ribs and grabs {mf|him|her} by the collar, spitting abuse. It is an enforcer patrolling the voidship. And she is clearly displeased.

The Rogue Trader awakes after unsettled sleep to find {mf|himself|herself} lying on a stiff cardboard mat. {mf|He|She} is overcome with a strange sense of wrongness. The place is dark and reeks of body odour. Someone elbows the Rogue Trader under the ribs and grabs {mf|him|her} by the collar, spitting abuse. It is an enforcer patrolling the voidship. And she is clearly displeased.

You awake after unsettled sleep to find yourself lying on a stiff cardboard mat. You are overcome with a strange sense of wrongness. The place is dark and reeks of body odour. Someone elbows you under the ribs and grabs you by the collar, spitting abuse. It is an enforcer patrolling the voidship. And she is clearly displeased.

languages.text: 你睡得非常不舒服。醒来后，你发现自己躺在一张用硬纸板制成的垫子上。你感到自己产生了古怪的错乱感：这个地方很黑，而且充满了体臭。有人用胳膊肘顶了顶你的肋骨，抓住你的领子，吐出一大串谩骂。那是个在虚空舰上巡逻的执法者，而且很显然，她看起来相当不满。
languages.original_text: You awake after unsettled sleep to find yourself lying on a stiff cardboard mat. You are overcome with a strange sense of wrongness. The place is dark and reeks of body odour. Someone elbows you under the ribs and grabs you by the collar, spitting abuse. It is an enforcer patrolling the voidship. And she is clearly displeased.

traits.locale_text: 你睡得非常不舒服。醒来后，你发现自己躺在一张用硬纸板制成的垫子上。你感到自己产生了古怪的错乱感：这个地方很黑，而且充满了体臭。有人用胳膊肘顶了顶你的肋骨，抓住你的领子，吐出一大串谩骂。那是个在虚空舰上巡逻的执法者，而且很显然，她看起来相当不满。

languages.text: Despiertas de un sueño intranquilo para encontrarte tumbad{mf|o|a} en una dura esterilla de cartón. Algo está fuera de lugar. Te encuentras en una zona oscura que apesta a sudor. Alguien te da un codazo en las costillas, te levanta por la ropa y te insulta a gritos. Es una guardia que patrulla la nave, y está claramente irritada.
languages.original_text: You awake after unsettled sleep to find yourself lying on a stiff cardboard mat. You are overcome with a strange sense of wrongness. The place is dark and reeks of body odour. Someone elbows you under the ribs and grabs you by the collar, spitting abuse. It is an enforcer patrolling the voidship. And she is clearly displeased.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente despierta de un sueño intranquilo para encontrarse tumbad{mf|o|a} en una dura esterilla de cartón. Algo está fuera de lugar. Se encuentra en una zona oscura que apesta a sudor. Alguien le da un codazo en las costillas, {mf|le|la} levanta por la ropa y {mf|le|la} insulta a gritos. Es una guardia que patrulla la nave, y está claramente irritada.

languages.text: あなたは浅い眠りから目を覚ます。硬い段ボールの上に横たわっていた。 奇妙な違和感に襲われる。辺りは暗く、体臭が立ち込めている。何者かがあなたの肋骨に肘鉄を食らわし、襟をつかんで罵声を浴びせた。ヴォイドシップを警備していた執行官だった。明らかに機嫌が良くないようだ。
languages.original_text: You awake after unsettled sleep to find yourself lying on a stiff cardboard mat. You are overcome with a strange sense of wrongness. The place is dark and reeks of body odour. Someone elbows you under the ribs and grabs you by the collar, spitting abuse. It is an enforcer patrolling the voidship. And she is clearly displeased.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーが浅い眠りから目を覚ます。硬い段ボールの上に横たわっていた。 奇妙な違和感に襲われる。辺りは暗く、体臭が立ち込めている。何者かがローグトレーダーの肋骨に肘鉄を食らわし、襟をつかんで罵声を浴びせた。ヴォイドシップを警備していた執行官だった。明らかに機嫌が良くないようだ。

languages.text: Nach einem unruhigen Schlaf erwachst du auf einem steifen Stück Karton. Du hast das seltsame Gefühl, dass etwas nicht stimmt. Der Ort ist dunkel und riecht nach Schweiß. Jemand rammt dir den Ellbogen in die Rippen, packt dich am Kragen und beleidigt dich. Eine Enforcerin, die auf dem Raumschiff patrouilliert. Und sie ist offensichtlich wütend.
languages.original_text: You awake after unsettled sleep to find yourself lying on a stiff cardboard mat. You are overcome with a strange sense of wrongness. The place is dark and reeks of body odour. Someone elbows you under the ribs and grabs you by the collar, spitting abuse. It is an enforcer patrolling the voidship. And she is clearly displeased.

traits.locale_text: Nach einem unruhigen Schlaf erwachst du auf einem steifen Stück Karton. Du hast das seltsame Gefühl, dass etwas nicht stimmt. Der Ort ist dunkel und riecht nach Schweiß. Jemand rammt dir den Ellbogen in die Rippen, packt dich am Kragen und beleidigt dich. Eine Enforcerin, die auf dem Raumschiff patrouilliert. Und sie ist offensichtlich wütend.

Nach einem unruhigen Schlaf erwacht {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} auf einem steifen Stück Karton. {mf|Er|Sie} wird überwältigt von dem merkwürdigen Gefühl, dass etwas nicht stimmt. Es ist dunkel und stinkt nach Schweiß. Jemand rammt {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} den Ellbogen in die Rippen, packt {mf|ihn|sie} am Kragen und beleidigt ihn aufs Übelste. Es ist eine Enforcerin, die auf dem Raumschiff patrouilliert. Und sie ist offensichtlich sehr verärgert.

languages.text: Vous vous réveillez après un sommeil agité sur un matelas en carton rigide. Vous êtes envahi par une impression d'incongruité. Cet endroit est sombre et empeste la transpiration. Quelqu'un vous enfonce son coude dans les côtes et vous attrape par le cou, avant de vous hurler dessus. Il s'agit d'une prévote patrouillant le vaisseau spatial. Et elle est clairement contrariée.
languages.original_text: You awake after unsettled sleep to find yourself lying on a stiff cardboard mat. You are overcome with a strange sense of wrongness. The place is dark and reeks of body odour. Someone elbows you under the ribs and grabs you by the collar, spitting abuse. It is an enforcer patrolling the voidship. And she is clearly displeased.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} se réveille après un sommeil agité et se retrouve {mf|allongé|allongée} sur un matelas en carton rigide.{mf|Il est envahi|Elle est envahie} par une impression d'incongruité. Cet endroit est sombre et empeste la transpiration. Quelqu'un enfonce son coude dans les côtes {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et l'attrape par le cou, avant de lui cracher dessus. Il s'agit d'une exécutante patrouillant le croiseur stellaire. Et elle est clairement contrariée.

languages.text: Huzursuzca uykudan uyanıp kendini sert, karton bir yüzeyde yatarken buluyorsun. İçini garip bir yanlışlık duygusu sarıyor. Etraf karanlık ve pis vücut kokusu alıyorsun. Birisi kaburgalarına dirsek atıp seni yakalıyor, yakandan tutarak küfürler savuruyor. Bu, uçsuz gemisinde devriye gezen bir infazcı. Hoşnutsuz olduğu çok açık.
languages.original_text: You awake after unsettled sleep to find yourself lying on a stiff cardboard mat. You are overcome with a strange sense of wrongness. The place is dark and reeks of body odour. Someone elbows you under the ribs and grabs you by the collar, spitting abuse. It is an enforcer patrolling the voidship. And she is clearly displeased.
